channel.title: Fixing up Firemaking

item.title: Fixing up Firemaking
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

alright so i want to fix up firemaking butâ€¦ there is one problem i dont have the code to light a fire or dont have it so it creates the fire here is what i have

if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511 || (itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590))) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 1) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); createNewTileObject(currentX, currentY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(400, 11); sendMessage("You light the logs on fire."); } else { sendMessage("You need a firemaking of 1 to burn normal logs."); } }

any body got the code for the creating a fire and the tile object with a time that kills the fire and puts ashes??

Read full topic
